page.title: 15ACCOMMODATION IN ESKDALEMUIR
page.content: Hotel, farmhouse, self catering cottages and some caravan sites can be found in Eskdalemuir. The many visitors to the valley, be it to the Wildlife Centre specifically or to partake in the sporting facilities offered by the Economic Forestry Group,roe-deer stalking,rough shooting, driven grouse and pheasant , duck flighting, fishing ,hill walking, pony trekking can find first class accomodation. Farmers wives with their specialised skills in catering offer warm hospitality and excellent cuisine to visitors.Familys from the south sample the pleasures of spending a holiday in a self catering cottage with all modern facilities built by Thomas Telford's masons.Stressed professional business heads can find refuge in isolated cottages.
